comments_since_last_sample.body: Ahhh this was so much work but definitely worth it. Looks stunning and the hardware was the perfect choice. Beautiful work 😍
I’ve never heard of a black wash before this. I love the way it looks!
Oohhh I love it its beautiful, great job and tutorial.. Thank you 💜
You put in a lot of work but, it was totally worth it. The black wash on this furniture piece looks amazing Christina.♡✓♡
